cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: FortiWeb - Stack-based buffer overflow in command line interpreter

DocumentPublisher.ContactDetails: Fortinet PSIRT Contact: Email: vulnwatch@fortinet.com Website: fortiguard.com/psirt-pgpkey

DocumentNotes.Note: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows [CWE-121] in the command line interpreter of FortiWeb may allow an authenticated attacker to achieve arbitrary code execution via specially crafted commands.
FortiWeb 6.4.1 and earlier. FortiWeb 6.3.15 and earlier. FortiWeb 6.2.5 and earlier. FortiWeb 6.1.2 and earlier. FortiWeb 6.0.7 and earlier. All FortiWeb versions 5.x are also affected.
Upgrade to FortiWeb 6.4.2 and later. Upgrade to FortiWeb 6.3.16 and later. Upgrade to FortiWeb 6.2.6 and later. Fixes for older versions to be confirmed.
Internally discovered and reported by Giuseppe Cocomazzi of Fortinet Product Security team.

Acknowledgment.Description: Internally discovered and reported by Giuseppe Cocomazzi of Fortinet Product Security team.
